original_text:
Now no one can look at the sun,
    bright as it is in the skies
    after the wind has swept them clean.
korean_text: 그런즉 바람이 불어 하늘이 말끔하게 되었을 때 그 밝은 빛을 아무도 볼 수 없느니라

sentences.original_text: Now no one can look at the sun
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 아무도 해를 바라볼 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: bright as it is in the skies
after the wind has swept them clean
